title: Someone Exactly Like Me
description: Someone Exactly Like Me is a slow burn, friends to lovers, slight forced proximity romance about an off-limits celebrity and the romance author who unexpectedly steals his heart.Niccolo Mancini steams into my life when my career is at an all-time low.What kind of romance author doesn’t even know what love or passion feels like?I certainly didn’t expect to find them in him.A scorching-hot, Italian, film star who’s just skyrocketed to fame.Unable to imagine he’d be interested in a nobody like me, I can’t help but be drawn to his magnetism.He's everything I thought I could never have.From the minute Destiny Cardone stumbled backwards, she captured my attention.She’s beautiful and real and sees what’s beneath what I show the world, broken pieces and all.She's everything I've always wanted and unattainable on every level.And she holds the key to my future.I offer a business deal to help us both get what we want.As the terms of the deal play out, undeniable attraction ignites.Hearts entangle.Then it all implodes, leaving me wondering if I should let her go.The problem with that is, I’m not sure I can…This is Book 1 in the Wounded Hearts Series. While it can be read as a standalone, your experience will be better if you read this book first. I hope you enjoy this soul mates, strong female friendship, wounded / broken / Mediterranean hero romance story.
author: Debbie Cromack
